Name: Combatant Helm
Description: A reinforced helm designed for frontline combat, providing enhanced protection and situational awareness.

Name: Combatant Jacket
Description: A rugged jacket with reinforced plating, offering robust defense while maintaining mobility.

Name: Combatant Gloves
Description: Heavy-duty gloves designed for handling weapons and equipment, enhancing grip and resilience.

Name: Combatant Belt
Description: A sturdy belt equipped with ammunition pouches and utility hooks for rapid access to gear.

Name: Combatant Pants
Description: Tactically designed pants offering protection and flexibility for various combat maneuvers.

Name: Combatant Boots
Description: Reinforced boots providing stability and support in rough terrains, ideal for prolonged engagements.
